entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 near noon. High plus 1.
